short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instantly translate selected text in browser from japanese to english and vice versa

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Allows quick and simple translation of japanese words in just a few clicks. Select a word or a single kanji, press Ctrl+Shift+L and you'll be presented with concise yet informative information panel with all known translations and reading for the word.

Powerd by jisho.org
